title: Updates on Flash Token Bar
content:
Version 1.12.0:

  • Compatibility with Midi-QoL The module already had compatibility with Midi-QoL, but you were recommended to not use the setting that sends roll requests from character sheets. Now, this setting should also work fine with Midi, so you can send requests to players for attacks and spell rools. Feel free to report any concerns!

If you like this module, consider supporting me on Patreon.

Join the discussion on Discord or visit the Github repository.
